title: Remote Python Engineer
requirements_description: You must have development experience with Python.
You have experience writing tests for features, you code and you are always looking to increase test coverage where it makes sense.
You have experience building new applications, integrate with existing platforms, and maintain complex features.
Being comfortable collaborating with external clients
We use Docker, Docker-compose and a variety of cloud platforms (AWS/Azure), so we’d like to see demonstrable knowledge.
You would need to be familiar with DevOps principles and practices.
Being comfortable speaking & presenting to technical and non-technical audiences.
Being comfortable taking the initiative and enjoying solving problems by using your technical knowledge.
Knowledge of  Node.js/C#/Java/Rust is a bonus.
offer_description: DeFi and Web3.0 have turned out to be the killer apps that are taking public distributed ledgers from niche products for speculators and hobbyists to projects of global economic significance. No matter how powerful and flexible you build a platform, at the end of the day, the success of Radix will reside on how it interacts with other projects in the space.

Would you thrive in a place where you are responsible for the smooth integration of a wide variety of crypto services like exchanges, oracles and bridges? Building tools for internal and external stakeholders, you will get to be at the forefront of integrating crypto projects in the Radix network.  As our dedicated Crypto Integrations Engineer, you will be working closely with engineers in multiple teams to ensure that our external partners have the best possible experience coming to grips with the Radix stack.

You will have the opportunity to grow your technical knowledge and have unique visibility on the crypto ecosystem that is going to build around Radix. You’ll gain insight on on-chain oracles, exchanges, automated market makers and many others to come.

At RDX Works, we're a team of like-minded thinkers who have long been convinced that we're living in the earliest stages of a global financial revolution. This revolution is being fuelled by decentralized finance (or DeFi for short), which is enabling an assortment of pioneering developers and entrepreneurs to re-invent almost every financial product that is currently traded and invested in traditional markets, without requiring central authorities or siloed infrastructure. DeFi has captured a great deal of attention and investment in the crypto-aware niche, growing assets under management from $1 billion to over $200 billion in a few years. Impressive as its growth has been, its current market size isn't even a rounding error on the over $400 trillion held in traditional finance. We're focused on what it will take to go from billions to trillions.

RDX went back to first principles to come up with the right technical solution—the first layer-one protocol built specifically for mainstream DeFi—and we have already tested out at over 1 million transactions per second. We're keenly aware that the need for an infinitely scalable platform is only one prerequisite among many for mass adoption, and we're also blazing new ground in the areas of purpose-built developer tools, user experiences, and regulatory integration.
We have forged a path deep into the future of what distributed ledger technology is going to look like and we need you to come and be part of the team that is making that happen right now.
tasks_range: Zakres obowiązków
Oryginalny tekst.
Pokaż tłumaczenie
You’ll build tools for integration with exchanges, oracles, bridges and many others during the integration phase and future upgrades.
You’ll coordinate across different channels, both within RDX Works and exchanges to overcome technical challenges, manage/mitigate risks, and ensure the successful integration with the Radix network.
You’ll become an expert on Radix Network Gateway and answer detailed questions from integration partners on functionality, and best practices/recommendations for integration.

You’ll maintain and improve documentation for external and internal use. Therefore, having experience collecting and documenting requirements in formats such as user stories & use cases would be advantageous.
You’ll help the Radix community and integration partners by writing tools that automate some of the processes.

You could be a great fit, if our company values resonate with you - Ask for help, Get shit done. Be excellent to each other. Take the initiative, You’ve got this. Do the right thing, not the easy thing. Strong opinions, loosely held.

title: Data Analytics Analyst, Senior Associate
offer_specs: Praca zdalna przez 1 dzień w tygodniu
requirements_description: These skills will help you succeed in this role
Strong project management skills, ability to influence cross-functionally in a rapidly evolving business environment while managing multiple / concurrent projects.
Strong analytical skills and detail oriented.
Strong written and verbal communication, presentation and technical writing skills.
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Data Analytics, Data Science, Engineering, Math, Accounting, or Finance.
A minimum of 4 years programming, application or reporting development experience (SAS, SQL, Business Objects, MS SQL Server, Teradata, ACL).
Hold certification in one of the following: CPA, CIA, CISA, CISSP, CFE.

A minimum of 4 years of relevant work experience at a financial services company or comparable experience working as an advisor for a financial services company with both Information Technology and Data Analytics experience.
Previous experience in Information Technology Audit and Data Analytics team is preferred.
Potential for 10% domestic and / or international travel
Are you the right candidate? Yes!

We truly believe in the power that comes from the diverse backgrounds and experiences our employees bring with them. Although each vacancy details what we are looking for, we don’t necessarily need you to fulfil all of them when applying. If you like change and innovation, seek to see the bigger picture, make data driven decisions and are a good team player, you could be a great fit.
offer_description: We are looking for a Data Analytics Analyst, Senior Associate to join our Data Analytics team that is incorporated in our Corporate Audit Division. You will work collaboratively with our stakeholders to coordinate data analytics requests, analyze, interpret and deliver solutions to the audit team. In this role you will be part of State Street Bank International and you will be based out of Krakow, Poland.
This role can be performed in a hybrid model, where you can balance work from home and office to match your needs and role requirements.
Why this role is important to us

The team you will be joining plays an important role in the overall success of the organization. Across the globe, institutional investors rely on us to help them manage risk, respond to challenges, and drive performance and profitability. To make that happen we need teams like yours to help navigate employees and the organization as a whole. In your role you will strive for cutting-edge solutions, that are straightforward and scalable. You will help us build resilience and execute day to day deliverables at our best. Join us if making your mark in the financial services industry from day one is a challenge you are up for.

As a member of our team, you’ll have access to competitive benefits, a wide range of resources for networking and mentorship, flexible work options, and a wealth of development programs to help you reach your full potential.

We're focused on hiring and developing the most talented people in the industry. We look for employees with diverse backgrounds and perspectives who will thrive in an entrepreneurial culture and contribute to our long-term success.
If you’re looking for your next challenge, take a look at us.

Just starting your job search? We have many opportunities for students and recent graduates in our offices around the globe. If you want to jump-start your financial services career working for an industry leader, we’re looking for you!

The road to success has no end. We’re continually setting the standard for innovation and quality to help drive better outcomes for the world’s investors and the people they serve. In a world that is preoccupied with the short-term, we are focused on our clients' long-term success.

Our strong corporate values are at the core of how we conduct our business, serve our clients, support our communities and challenge business as usual. We’re proud that State Street Global Advisors’ Fearless Girl campaign, which called on companies to add more women to their boards, has impacted business practices around the world.

We strive to be our clients’ essential partner. Our continued success depends on our ability to attract and develop the best talent. That’s why we’re keenly focused on employee development, corporate citizenship and inclusion. Learn more about our focus on maintaining a diverse workforce.

Leading companies like Marathon Oil and Shopify trust Grassroots Carbon to help them to reach their carbon reduction goals. Our rancher network covers over 6 million acres of US grasslands, enabling Grassroots Carbon to deliver millions of tons of CO2 storage every year.

offer_description: We are looking for a Python Developer to join our friendly team.

Yes, we’re hiring! We’re looking for a careful specialist whose duties include maintaining the existing product, creating new features, solving basic issues on a backlog that already exists, and doing it with pleasure. If you would like to be in good company with our best talents, this is a great chance to do it!

You’ll work with data security and financial crimes. In short, businesses need real-time financial crime insight to put them in control. Our customer's product is a unique real-time database that allows users to understand the risks of doing business with their partners.
The database actively identifies thousands of risky events from millions of structured and unstructured data points every day. You’ll help the users to evaluate business risks.
the team consists of 5 engineers (Middle & Senior level specialists);
the stack of technologies that are used on the project: Python, Flask;
the workflow is organized according to Kanban: the team has daily meetings and does retrospectives and sprint planning every two weeks.
Flexibility not only in the schedule but in tasks. You’ll be able to change a project or a stack within the project. We’ll not get you bored or burnout anyway!
Competitive compensation depends on experience and skills. Underestimation of your impact is not allowed in our company!
Real career growth both financial and professional. Our people are our biggest asset. A skillful and motivated developer can easily become a team lead, own features, or mentor Juniors if you want.
Close cooperation with the team of strong professionals working in the dynamic IT environment.
Remember, our people are our biggest asset and your well-being is our utmost priority.

Celem platformy jest pomagać firmom automatycznie porządkować obszerne nieustrukturyzowane dokumenty, analizować ich poufne dane, tworzyć narzędzia do zarządzania nimi, automatycznie je ekstrahować i monitorować w oparciu o modele machine learningowe. title: CyberSecurity Engineer
requirements_description: of developer experience within a commercial product environment
offer_description: In this position, you’ll bring value by proposing and implementing solutions that help to mitigate fraud.
Fraud Intelligence is a team that connects Nethone with frauds.
We use feedback from customers and data and internal research as input and generate ideas and solutions that improve detection.
We research methods used by fraudsters and find weak points in their modus operandi
We are creating new solutions used for fraud detection based on the customers’ data/feedback mixed with the team’s expertise.
We were brainstorming next-generation detection solutions capable of covering multiple fraud use cases. It mixes technical knowledge, fraudster modus operandi, and data capabilities.
Diving deep into the technologies used by fraudsters - sometimes reverse engineering, deep data analysis, finding blind spots, and following new changes.
Ideas are often forged into Proof of Concept (PoC) that verifies the initial assumptions. In some cases, however, the change might require support from other teams.

Everything changes - fraudsters, tools, and technology - this is why minor tweaks and adjustments are usually needed after we apply the solution to the operational data. We also review the answers over time to stay ahead of the fraudsters in the race for detection.

Converting ideas into working solutions
Research and brainstorm together to identify creative new ways of detecting fraudsters.

Propose and deliver PoCs with the team.

There’s still a lot to do to in the energy markets, so this role will allow you to make a great impact on the whole industry.
There is no way today for businesses to directly buy from renewable generators.
green-washed tariffs which see little value being returned to renewable generators
little to no transparency in an overly complex market

However, customers can’t spend the time and effort fixing this as they need to focus on running their business - ironically they just have to accept a lack of power when it comes to buying and selling their power.
If the industry hasn’t changed for 50 years, so maybe this is just the way it has to be?

This is where tem. come in - re-imagined from the bottom up, using new technology, we can build a marketplace that works for all people, a marketplace that actually accelerates the renewable power transition by returning all the power and value back to the end customers.

We are one of a very few companies in Poland dedicated to designing and manufacturing high quality consumer electronics, aimed at the international market, especially USA and EU. Some of our first, already released products, consist of, among others, the world’s only e-ink alarm clock, Mudita Harmony and Mudita Pure, a classic, e-ink phone, which has already received numerous prestigious design awards, such as the German Design Award, IF Design Award, A’design Award, and the Good Design Award. ⌚📱

Our goal is to create unique products featuring top notch minimalist design, in order to help us to live our life in harmony with modern technology. We strive to be independent thinkers, who are not afraid of introducing products which go against typical hot trends, highly promoted by the mainstream big tech companies. To achieve our objective, we rely heavily on custom-designed solutions, like our very own mobile operating system, MuditaOS developed in-house, from scratch, which we also made Open Source since transparency, openness and focus on the community is fundamental to Mudita's philosophy.

Our company culture is very open, with easy access to all decision makers, including Michał Kiciński, our founder, main shareholder and CEO. Michał is known for being the co-founder of CD Projekt, the leader of the gaming industry in Poland. Thanks to his support, Mudita can offer a secure and financially stable working environment, perfect for anyone who is serious about a long-term career in the tech industry.

Większość naszych ekspertów prowadzi z nami więcej niż jeden projekt. Wspieramy ich nie tylko podczas całego procesu rekrutacji, ale przez cały okres zatrudnienia.

Ważna jest dla nas kultura uczciwości i rzetelnego informowania o możliwościach rozwoju zawodowego. Nasze projekty realizujemy głównie w oparciu o model pracy zdalnej i indywidualne podejście. Cały proces rekrutacji staramy się skrócić do minimum. Zwykle przebiega według następującego planu:
Obecnie poszukujemy idealnych kandydatów chętnych do objęcia stanowiska Data Developerów w jednym z projektów oferowanych przez naszych klientów.

offer_description: 🚀 SmartRecruiters is building an operating system (SaaS product hosted on AWS and GCP) for recruiting and is on a mission to connect people with jobs at scale. The company is growing quickly and recently hit the 1.5 billion dollar valuation. The system is used by over 4,000 companies, including employees at LinkedIn, McDonald's, Bosch, Allegro, and many more! Our engineering team solves one of the most important problems of the modern economy - connecting great people with great jobs. We supported over 100M job seekers to date! 💪 🚀
Our system is composed of hundreds of independent services (each sitting on Docker, orchestrated by Kubernetes). We build most of our services in
Java and do over 2000 production deployments per month, maintaining an uptime of 99.98.
We are looking for an Engineering Team Lead to help us build the next chapter of that vision.

🚀 Our engineering organization is built with cross-functional product teams where Engineers, Product Managers, and Designers work side by side to solve customer problems.  Each team owns a part of our business and takes care of it, from feature ideas to usage analysis.

Talent Experience Group consists of three teams focused on supporting the candidate persona. Teams within the group support a fast and easy application process, smooth onboarding, and transparent internal mobility.
We are looking for an experienced Engineering Manager that would like to partner with our Design and Product Managers and deliver the engineering vision and strategy for the group.
50% of their time managing people and collaborating with stakeholders and 50% of their time designing and building products.
Team Leads represent their teams externally, help others grow, and ensure the team's discovery and delivery work runs smoothly.
You may be located anywhere in Poland and work remotely or out of our Cracow office!

Collaborate with Product Managers and Product Designers on building the next-generation product

Oversee roadmap discovery and delivery (including capacity planning, dependency analysis, forecasting, scheduling, and metrics collection)
Take ownership of the designated services
Drive engineering excellence across the organization
Mentor and coach Team Leaders and Software Engineers

Success in this role will lean on your ability to plan your work, be self-motivated, use critical thinking, troubleshooting skills, and to challenge the status quo. You should have a passion for building high quality software for solving analytical problems with high-performance GPU computing.

offer_description: W ramach pracy będziesz mógł/mogła współtworzyć innowacyjną platformę pomagającą graczom osiągać jak najlepsze wyniki w najpopularniejszych grach online. Twój wkład w projekt realnie pomoże setkom tysięcy graczy na całym świecie w podnoszeniu ich osobistych umiejętności.

Projekt zakłada zbudowanie unikalnego rozwiązania reprezentującego graczy, gry jak i poszczególne rozgrywki w spójnej przestrzeni wektorowej a następnie wykorzystanie przestrzeni w zagadnieniach rekomendacyjnych oraz analitycznych. Projekt zakłada zastosowanie zarówno danych dziedzinowych jak i transfer wiedzy w oparciu o dodatkowe zbiory otwarte jak i posiadane wewnętrznie. W ramach projektu konieczne będzie sprostanie wyzwaniom związanym zarówno z jakością budowanych metod jak i ich wydajnością. Budowane metody i algorytmy muszą być skalowalne jak również w pełni zintegrowane z jednocześnie powstającą platformą internetową udostępniającą metody uczenia maszynowego użytkownikom końcowym.

offer_description: Billon stworzył od podstaw swoją własną autorską technologię blockchain/DLT i z powodzeniem rozwija ją od ponad 7 lat. Nasz system rozproszony oferuje najwyższy poziom prywatności i wysoką wydajność, o rzędy wielkości przewyższającą tradycyjne publiczne blockchainy. Całkowicie zaprojektowany jest i rozwijany siłami zespołu polskich programistów i kryptologów. Równocześnie praca odbywa się w środowisku międzynarodowym ze względu na zagranicznych Klientów oraz współpracowników zlokalizowanych w UK.

Szukamy programistów i programistek do uczestnictwa w projekcie z obszaru Zaufanych Dokumentów, w ramach których Billon dostarcza rozwiązania umożliwiające publikację, weryfikację i odczyt całych dokumentów biznesowych w sposób gwarantujący ich niezmienność, poufność i źródło pochodzenia.

Jeśli posiadasz co najmniej 3 letnie doświadczenie, masz wykształcenie wyższe informatyczne, ponadto chcesz uczyć się nowych narzędzi czy bibliotek, to zapraszamy do niewielkiego, ale jakże zgranego zespołu programistów!
tasks_range: Zakres obowiązków
Utrzymanie i rozwijanie narzędzi do zarządzania  środowiskami deweloperskimi i produkcyjnymi
Tworzenie narzędzi do zbierania i prezentowania statystyk związanych z funkcjonalnościami naszej infrastruktury
Tworzenie narzędzi pomocniczych do analizy wydajności i niezawodności aplikacji

offer_description: The Senior Data Engineer for the iConnect Suggestions project

will lead a team of junior data engineers who implement the logic to update or create suggestions to pharma sales representatives based on business requirement. This will mostly be based on pre-existing business rule templates to be configured in JSON, but may also require custom coding in Python and SQL. In the case of custom coding requirements, the senior data engineer will decide whether to implement this themselves or distribute to the team, depending on complexity. The project is implemented on AWS, so a good knowledge on cloud architectures, especially based on AWS, combined with experience working closely with agile software development teams are key.
tasks_range: Zakres obowiązków
Oryginalny tekst.
Pokaż tłumaczenie
Coordinate a team of junior data engineers, including technical task definition, guidance and quality assurance.
Identify the root causes of issues with existing data and suggestion generation pipelines and implement fixes (will require debugging in AWS Step Functions, Glue, Athena and Lambda).
Implement the data analysis steps needed to generate suggestions for pharma sales representatives within the framework of the project.
Implement the above in an agile development team.

offer_description: Solar Spy is an analytical platform dedicated to support solar farm operations. It processes various types of PV plant data, including image data from aerial inspections, weather data, data from photovoltaic installation infrastructure elements, and more. Through the use of artificial intelligence models, we identify problems, help to optimize maintenance costs, and predict energy production. Our main objective is to maximize green energy production and reduce O&M costs.

As we work with huge amounts of mostly unstructured data, we are looking for a Data Ninja who can help us design and implement a scalable data architecture - capable of processing the data with high throughput in a distributed manner.
